name: Soft Diffusion
description: Moderate diffusion. Softens hard edges and shadows. Good for CYC scallops.

name: Hard Diffusion
description: Extreme diffusion. Lowers intensity of light. Good for softening very harsh edged light. Cloudy day look.

name: Linear Diffusion
description: Allows vertical or horizontal controllor "spreading" (diffusing) light. Good for combining with CYC colors to spread light when CYC wash lights are too close to CYC.

name: Early Morning Frost
description: A good medium diffusion. Softens shutter cuts and harsh gobo edges in new generation. A good diffusion to use when AP1650 is too light.

name: Weaved Diffusion
description: A very wide light diffusion. Still allows original beam of light to be visible. Good for distributing light into shade and softening gobos. Not susceptible to wind noise in outdoor applications.

name: Light Weaved Diffusion
description: Half version of AP1400. A very wide light diffusion. Still allows original beam of light to be visible. Good for distributing light into shade and softening gobos. Not susceptible to wind noise in outdoor applications.

name: Flat Diffusion
description: Medium diffusion. Softens hard edges. Similar to AP1450. Good for softening harsh shutter cuts.

name: Textured Diffusion
description: Moderate diffusion. Considerable softening of shadows and edges. Original image still visible.

name: White Diffusion
description: Most extreme diffusion. Yellows light output. Softens shadows considerably. Good for softening lines in skin.

name: Light Textured Diffusion
description: Good for softening harsh shutter lines or gobos. A commonly used diffusion for softening edges on new generation ellipsoid.

name: Red Diffusion
description: Diffused red primary for CYC washes. Softens fixture "scallops".

name: Blue Diffusion
description: Diffused blue primary for CYC washes. Softens fixture "scallops".

name: Green Diffusion
description: Diffused green primary for CYC washes. Softens fixture "scallops".

name: Apollo Blue Full CTB
description: Neutral wash color. A safe color. A clear white light. Very good for all colors.

name: Apollo Blue 3/4 CTB
description: A 25% lighter version of AP2000. Same qualities with less saturation.

name: Apollo Blue 1/2 CTB
description: A 50% lighter version of AP2000. Same qualities with less saturation. A bit yellower.

name: Apollo Blue 1/3 CTB
description: A 70% lighter version of AP2000. Same qualities with less saturation. A bit yellower. A pleasant lavender.

name: Apollo Blue 1/4 CTB
description: A 75% lighter version of AP2000. Same qualities with less saturation. A bit yellower. A warm lavender.

name: Apollo Blue 1/8 CTB
description: A very light version of AP2000. Cools down a warm color temperature lamp a bit. A subtle color change.

name: Apollo Blue 2x CTB
description: A double version of AP2000. Nice deep cool blue that keeps colors true but dulls a bit.

name: Apollo Orange Full CTO
description: Warm sunsets. Good on skin tones. Rich color. Fire side warm sources.

name: Apollo Orange 3/4 CTO
description: A 25% lighter version of AP2100. Same qualities with less saturation.

name: Apollo Orange 1/2 CTO
description: A 50% lighter version of AP2120. Same qualities with less saturation. Not as rich or warm.

name: Apollo Orange 1/4 CTO
description: A 75% lighter version of AP2100. Same qualities with less saturation. Not as rich or warm. A good warm skin toner.

name: Apollo Orange 1/8 CTO
description: A 87.5% (90%) lighter version of AP2100. Very pale. A slight warming color. A subtle warm.

name: Apollo Orange 2x CTO
description: A double version of AP2100. Deep color. Good for sunset, sunrise, and fire light.

name: Apollo Straw Full CTS
description: Less red, more yellow. Noon sun when used with light blue. Very warm. Good on skin tone at sunset.

name: Apollo Straw 1/2 CTS
description: Same as AP2200 but 50% lighter. Very warm, noon day desert (exaggerated sun).

name: Apollo Straw 1/4 CTS
description: Same as AP2200 but 75% lighter. A bit less yellow than AP2200. Noon day / Summer sun.

name: Apollo Straw 1/8 CTS
description: Same as AP2200 but 87.5% lighter. A subtle warm color. Good on skin tones. Warms up light a bit.

name: .3 Neutral Density
description: No color influence. Good to drop overall light intensity by 50%. Use when dimming is not available on display or fluorescent lighting.

name: .6 Neutral Density
description: No color influence. Use to drop overall light intensity by 75%. Use when dimming is not available on display or fluorescent lighting.

name: .9 Neutral Density
description: No color influence. Use to drop light intensity by 87.3% (90%). Use when dimming is not available on display or fluorescent lighting.

name: Simply Mauvelous
description: Special effects color. Nice sunset color. Light from Chinese lanterns, neon light, "light through dense smoke", and costume color.

name: Purple Mist
description: Special effects color. Costume color. Muted purple. A reddish neutral lavender. Mysterious effect.

name: Precious Purple
description: Special effects color. Costume color. Neon light. A reddish magenta.

name: Sour Grape
description: Special effects color. Costume color. Brilliant fluorescent effect. Cartoon or fantasy color.

name: Purplexed %T = 31.5
description: Good for tanned or darker skin tones. A pinkish neutral. Good for all costume and scenic colors.

name: Submissive Lavender
description: A very good neutral color. A safe color.

name: Lavender Retriever
description: An excellent neutral color between AP3200 and AP3250. A safe color. Kind to skin tones.

name: Dominant Lavender
description: A very good neutral. A bit more color than AP3200 with a touch more blue.

name: Whispering Lavender
description: A good neutral. A paler blue than AP3200. Good on pinkish skin tones.

name: Breathless Lavender
description: An ideal neutral. Good for white and light costumes. Nice warmish neutral.

name: Luscious Lilac
description: A cooler neutral. Good for night scenes that need good visibility. Could be used for bright moonlight.

name: Bodacious Blueberry
description: Deeper neutral. Good for night scenes with good visibility. Makes skin tones look aged.

name: Apollo Lavender
description: A true purple. Good special effects or costume color. A bit fluorescent.

name: Alexander The Grape
description: A very good neutral wash color. No leanings to green. Brings out red in skin tones. Good rainy overcast day light.

name: Malice Blue
description: Cool neutral. Good for twilight. Ages skin tones a bit.

name: Late Night Lavender
description: Good effects and costume color. Good for light from Japanese lantern. Lots of red tones.

name: Flirtatious Lavender
description: A reddish neutral. Muted blue. Good for effects and costume colors. Good for sunset.

name: Groovy Grape
description: Good effects or costume color. Deep, rich color.

name: Cowboys & Indigo
description: A very deep blue/indigo. Good for dark, mysterious night scenes.

name: King Congo Blue
description: An extremely deep blue/purple. Use for dark mysterious setting. Nighttime. Works for some ultraviolet backlight effects. (Test on the actual light instrument).

name: Voodoo Lavender
description: A very deep lavender. Good for nighttime scenes. Mysterious atmosphere.

name: Seductive Blue
description: A deep, clean blue. Good for cool color washes. Good for nighttime scenes. A rich blue.

name: Mournful Blue
description: A very deep indigo blue. Good effect color. An extremely deep neutral. A rich indigo.

name: Blurple %T = 6.1
description: Good pale nighttime blue color.

name: New York Blue
description: A good cool wash blue. Nice vibrant night color. A tranquil color.

name: Bright Blue
description: A good cool blue wash color. Clean, not much red.

name: Apollo Blue
description: A good blue wash. A touch of green tint. Good costume color. A bit mysterious. Good for blue CYC wash.

name: Rhythm & Blue
description: A good cool or neutral wash color. Good for backlight. Nice moonlight color. Calming.

name: London Blue
description: Nice steel blue. Good for cool wash. Nice moonlight color.

name: Sultry Blue
description: Good cool wash. Bright nighttime blue. Good for warmer skin tones.

name: After Hours Blue
description: Deep pure blue. Good for mysterious night effect. Vibrant, deep saturation.

name: Heavenly Blue
description: Greenish blue. Good effects or costume color. Beware of the green!.

name: Ozone Blue
description: Good for cool wash light. A bit yellowish. Nice window light in night scene.

name: Electric Blue
description: Good warm blue. Good for cloudy day or pale moonlight. Can be used for CYC.

name: Kablueie %T = 32.7
description: A nice neutral blue. Good for pale moonlight. Can be used for nighttime cloud gobos.

name: Crisp Blue
description: Same as AP4600 but a bit bluer or grayer. Depressing color.

name: Blue Moon
description: A good neutral wash color. Bluish white light. Sky wash light.

name: Timid Blue
description: A yellowish neutral. Good for warmer colors.

name: Baby Boy Blue
description: A good warmer neutral. A nice morning sunlight color.

name: Monday Morning Blue
description: A bit bluer than AP4720. A nice neutral wash color.

name: Ice Blue
description: A green tinted neutral. Good for testing on cooler skin tones.

name: Blue My Mind
description: Greenish blue. Good to create sallow look on skin tones. Accents yellow hues.

name: Robin's Egg Blue
description: A medium aqua. Bad for skin tones. Good for moonlight through trees look. Good for specific costume colors.

name: Bluetylicious %T = 21.9
description: An even tone blue green. Good for moonlight. Late afternoon skylight. Not good on some skin tones. Good for most scenic colors.

name: Island Blue
description: A green aqua. An underground grotto color. Good for effects and costume colors. Bad color for red tones.

name: Caribbean Blue
description: A muted, cooler aqua. Good for moonlight through trees. Good for some blue, green, or yellow costume colors.

name: Atlantic Green Blue
description: A clean color. Good for moonlight. Bad on dark reds.

name: Hero Blue %T = 7.2
description: A night blue. Good for effects and costume colors.

name: Apollo Green
description: A primary green. Good for mixing with red-blue CYC color. Effects and costume color. Bad on skin tones.

name: Rock 'n Roll Green
description: A deeper primary green. Good for mixing with red-blue CYC color. Effects and costume color. Bad on skin tones.

name: Green Gello
description: A good primary green. Good for foliage gobos and mixing with red and blue primary, and lighting bullfrogs.

name: Neptune Blue Green
description: A green-blue. Good for effects and costume colors. Good "sea-like" color. Various night effects.

name: Montego Blue Green
description: A paler (lighter) version of AP5500. Good for effects and costume colors. Good "sea-like" color. Various night effects. Good for dream-like scenes.

name: Kelly Green
description: A muted green.Good for tree gobos. Costume and effects color. Eerie skin tones.

name: Envy Green
description: An excellent jungle or leaf color. Good for projecting foliage. A rich warm green.

name: Cactus Juice Green
description: A bit more saturated than AP5800. An excellent jungle or leaf color. Good for projecting foliage. A rich warm green.

name: Putting Green
description: A sickly type color. Good for foliage or warmer skin tones. Use with caution or on actors that no one likes.

name: Margarita Green
description: Has applications as a very warm wash color with certain skin tones. A bit jaundiced. Could be cleaned up with certain cools.

name: Yellow Snow %T = 86.4
description: Light, low saturation yellow. Good for warm sunlight and some skin tones (test first). Good for moon gobos and some Frank Zappa songs.

name: Banana Yellow
description: Harsh yellow. Could indicate a hot desert sun. Creates jaundiced skin tones. Great for yellow costume or scenic colors.

name: Neon Yellow
description: Very similar to AP6200, a touch less color. Could indicate a hot desert sun. Creates jaundiced skin tones. Great for yellow costume or scenic colors.

name: Pilsner Yellow
description: More amber tones than AP6200. Good for bluer skin tones. Very warm day light.

name: Bikini Yellow
description: Brighter version of AP6400. Good for warm sun effects and wash light. Will jaundice some skin tones.

name: Harvest Gold
description: A good warm wash color. Very little blue tone.

name: Mustard %T = 64.0
description: Good for deep desert sun. Subdues blue tones. Good for dim lantern or fire light.

name: Butterscotch %T = 60.5
description: Similar to AP6800 with a bit more orange. Good for deep desert sun. Subdues blue tones. Good for dim lantern or fire light. Nice for golden sunset and tasty on a sundae.

name: Fatherless Amber
description: Good on some skin tones. A bit orange. A commonly used warm color.

name: Hot Cocoa
description: (Low Transmission) A low blue content warm color. A good warm for a diverse spread of skin tones. Likes most colors.

name: Santa Fe Amber
description: A good desert or hot sun color. Great for pink sunset.

name: Adobe Orange
description: A very warm pink-orange. Good for pink sunsets.

name: Nude Gold
description: Good for bluer skin tones. Warm sunsets or desert light source.

name: Bashful Amber
description: A bit pinker than AP7050. Good for most skin tones. Can go to reddish. A rosy amber.

name: Rust Assured
description: A good hot desert sun color. Good for harvest moonlight. A sharp and vivid color.

name: Fool's Gold Amber
description: Use for fire light or lantern light. Good effects or costume color.

name: Apollo Gold
description: Good fire or lantern light. Warm wash color. Good for most colors.

name: Just Peachy
description: Similar to AP7400 but a bit more pink. Excellent sunset color. Very warm color.

name: Golden Amber
description: Good fire light color. A Serengeti sun color. A deep rich color.

name: Burnt Orange
description: A good warm wash color for hot sun and sunset. Good on colors.

name: Spiced Rum Amber
description: Similar to AP7420 with less pink. Excellent sunset color. Good for fall leaves.

name: Trick or Treat %T = 34.6
description: Good effect color. Good for firelight. A deep harvest moon gobo color. Use with care on skin tones. Good visual punch (and we mean PUNCH). NOT a shy color.

name: Apollo Orange
description: Deep color. Good effects and costume color. Fire light source.

name: Peach My Interest
description: An excellent warm wash color. Enhances most skin tones. A bit of red. A safe color.

name: Coral Amber
description: An excellent light warm wash color. Good on most skin tones. A good "ballet pink" for tutus.

name: Salmon"illa" %T = 47.5
description: Very similar to AP7650 but a bit more red. Good on cooler skin tones.

name: Peach Amber
description: A good warm wash color. Gives skin tone a healthy tanned look.

name: Sailor's Delight Orange
description: A deep color. Good effects or costume color. Harsh saturation.

name: Hot Wings %T = 22.0
description: A muted semi-deep Halloween orange. Good for firelight and pumpkin gobos. Non-cheery, very warm effects.

name: Apricot Orange
description: Similar to AP7750 but lighter. Nice rich warm color for projected sunsets. Good effects or costume color.

name: Hot Lava Orange
description: Harsh color. Good effects or costume color. Use for fire gobos or effects.

name: Kiss Me Tint
description: An excellent warm wash color. A neutral pink. Good on all colors and skin tones. Light and cheery color.

name: Mango Craze
description: A deep malevolent color. Good for effects and costume colors. Possible sunset color.

name: Scandalous Scarlet
description: A muted red. Good for effects and costume colors. A good "neon" effect color.

name: Vixen Red
description: A good neon effect color. Good for effects and costume colors. Exaggerated red sunset light on clouds.

name: Diva Red
description: A deep "clean" red. Good for primary CYC washes. Good for anger or violence effects.

name: Cherry Lewis
description: A muted fire red. Good for fire effects. Combine with light blue for sunset effect. A vivid deep color.

name: Tasty Apple Red
description: A deep red. Harsh color. Good for anger, mysterious, and dark effects. Can be used as a red primary.

name: Bludgeon Red
description: A deep red. Good for effects and costume colors. A mysterious or malevolent look. Can be used as a primary red.

name: Lipstick Red
description: A grayish red. Good costume color. Sunset color. OK on skin tones.

name: Front Rose
description: A lighter version of AP8400. Good costume color. OK on skin tones. Possible sunset color.

name: Watermelon Wine %T = 28.1
description: Good for visual tension. Good for setting sun gobos or effects. A safer red on skin tones.

name: Flamingo Pink %T = 42.5
description: A good deep pink. Can be used as a VERY warm wash color. A good sunset color.

name: Spanked Pink
description: A good warm wash color. A clean pink. A good all around color.

name: Tease Pink
description: A good pink for pale complexions. A bit reddish.

name: Pink Pong
description: Good on skin tones, good warm wash color. A clean, safe pink.

name: Bit of Pink
description: An excellent pink for washes. Very clean. A goo neutral warm.

name: Cotton Candy Pink
description: A safe color. Very similar to AP8550. A touch more saturated. Very subtle.

name: V.I.Pink %T = 33.7
description: A deep pink. Good on skin tones. Good for all costume colors.

name: In the Pink
description: A bright pink. Reddens skin tones. Good effects and costume color. A multi-faceted color.

name: Pinkerbell %T = 67.2
description: A light pink. Good for cheery warm wash. A bit yellowish though. Pushes reds in skin tones a bit.

name: Tickled Pink
description: A good warm neutral color. Good on most skin tones.

name: Rebecca's Pink Ribbon
description: A very clean and safe pink. An excellent followspot color. Good to all colors. A bit red on the skin in incandescent sourced fixtures.

name: Screamin' Pink
description: A garish pink. Good effects or costume color. Good for neon.

name: Hot Pink
description: A clean magenta. Good effect color. Overpowering saturation.

name: Sassy Pink
description: A bluer pink. Good effects or costume color. Can be neutralized with blue.

name: Ruby Slippers
description: A vivid red with blue under tones. Good for effects and costume colors. Not good on skin tones. A good color for lobsters.

name: Apollo Magenta
description: A muted, deep magenta. Good for effects and costume colors. Mysterious look.

name: Passion Pink
description: A bright and cheery magenta. A clean mix. Good for effects and costume colors.
